package com.university.reports;

public class ReportMain {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		Report r1 = new StudentTranscriptReport("Ahmed Ali", 3.7);
        Report r2 = new CourseRosterReport("OOP Java", 45);
        Report r3 = new InstructorLoadReport("Dr. Hassan", 3);
        Report r4 = new DepartmentSummaryReport("Computer Science", 20, 600);

        r1.generate();
        r2.generate();
        r3.generate();
        r4.generate();
    }
	}
